name: Filtered Water Trough
description: The Filtered Water Trough is an expensive variant of the Large Water Trough that is used to keep Mounts and Pets hydrated. Currently does not apply a modifier to animals that drink from it, making it an expensive upgrade to it's lower tier counterparts. Must be connected to Electricity and Water providing at least 1,000 Watts and 30 liters per second to function.
